name: auto-pr-update
description: Automatically update PR description and testing instructions before pushing changes

hooks.prompt:
A git push is about to happen. Check if there's an open PR for the current branch using the GitHub MCP tools. If a PR exists:

1. Get the PR details and the list of files changed
2. Analyze all commits on this branch (compared to the base branch)
3. Update the PR description with:
   - A clear summary of what changed (2-4 bullet points)
   - Testing instructions based on the changes
   - Keep any existing sections the user may have added manually

Use this format for the PR body:

## Summary
- [bullet points describing changes]

## Testing Instructions
- [specific steps to test the changes]

## Files Changed
- [list key files with brief description of changes]
